A diet that promotes consumption of foods rich in potassium, calcium and magnesium which get converted to alkaline PH in our body tissue after ingestion; and discourages consumption of acid-forming foods, i.e., those rich in phosphorous and protein.
Allergy or Food Hypersensitivity is a response from the immune system to a food that the body believes is harmful. Common food allergens in adults are nuts and seafood.

Bursitis is a painful inflammation that forms around your body's joints. It is due to inflammation of the fluid-filled sac (bursa) that lies between a tendon and skin, or between a tendon and bone. Tendinitis is inflammation of a tendon.

aka mouth ulcers.
